issue.title: [Python] feather.read_table should not require pandas
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8345](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8345). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We still check the pandas version, while pandas is not actually needed. Will do a quick fix.

comments.body:
